name: Patagonia Capilene Cool Trail Shirt - Men's
shortDescription: What feels like cotton yet has the wicking efficiency of polyester for running, biking, traveling or all of the above in the same day? The men's Patagonia Capilene Cool Trail shirt.
longDescription: "Made of 4 oz. polyester spun jersey that has a soft feel
column7: a light weight and Polygiene® permanent odor control so you stay welcome among friends at the end of the day
column8: Raglan sleeve construction with underarm gussets provides chafe-free comfort and range of motion
column9: Comfortable self-fabric scoop neck wicks moisture and won't bind
column10: Locker loop makes it easy to hang dry
column11: No tags at neck for itch-free comfort
column12: Droptail hem keeps length in place under a harness or hipbelt even during movement
column13: P-6 woven label at left-front hem"

name: Patagonia P-6 Logo Responsibili-Tee T-Shirt - Men's
shortDescription: Why buy any other T-shirt? When you purchase the comfy men's Patagonia P-6 Logo Responsibili-Tee t-shirt, you help divert 4.8 plastic bottles and 4.2 oz. of fabric scrap from the waste stream.
longDescription: "Manufacturing processes cut landfill and incinerator waste and reduce the need for petroleum to make raw materials
column7: Patagonia original artwork is screen printed with PVC- and phthalate-free inks
column8: Comfortable taped shoulder seams allow the T-shirt to retain its fit

name: Patagonia Fitz Roy Scope Responsibili-Tee T-Shirt - Men's
image: /images/Patagonia Fitz Roy Scope Responsibili-Tee T-Shirt - Men's.jpeg
shortDescription: The Patagonia Fitz Roy Scope Responsibili-Tee is made with 100% recycled fabrics. It features a large, colorful Fitz Roy graphic on the back and a smaller mountain logo at left chest.
longDescription: "Using recycled materials (including 0.26 lbs. of scrap fabric and 4.8 discarded bottles) reduces the petroleum needed to make raw material and cuts landfill/incinerator waste
column7: Producing this 100% recycled T-shirt uses 96% less water and creates 45% less CO2 than a conventional cotton T-shirt
column8: Taped shoulder seams for comfort and fit retention
